rooms.description: An open-plan space combining living, dining, and kitchen areas. Designed with Art Deco elements such as geometric patterns and metallic finishes to enhance the aesthetic appeal while ensuring ample natural light through large windows.

A dedicated private gym area integrated into the ground floor, featuring functional space with mirrored walls, soundproofing, and specialized lighting. The design includes built-in equipment storage ensuring a seamless look.
Garage space for vehicles along with auxiliary utility area. Designed with ample access to the exterior garden for easy movement of vehicles.
A guest bedroom designed with comfortable seating, built-in storage and subtle Art Deco detailing ensuring a welcoming environment.
Well-ventilated bathroom with efficient plumbing systems and natural light through frosted glass windows.

openings.description: Grand entrance door complemented by Art Deco design motifs. Ensures smooth flow from the garden to the interior.
Large windows facing the garden ensuring natural light and a sense of openness, adhering to Vastu principles for positive energy.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with ample window access to the garden and natural light. Features built-in closets, decorative Art Deco accents, and a private balcony.
Additional master bedroom designed for family members or guests, offering privacy with Vastu-aligned window placement.
Bright and airy child's room featuring natural light and ventilation, integrated Art Deco design details for a playful yet refined aesthetic.
Another child bedroom ensuring ample space and functional furniture arrangement according to local norms and Vastu principles.
Well-ventilated bathroom with natural lighting, designed in an open plan style aligning with Art Deco motifs for a seamless aesthetic transition between floors.

openings.description: A centrally located staircase connecting the ground and first floors, designed to ensure safe movement while maintaining open sightlines.
Access openings leading to balconies that overlook the garden, ensuring natural ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
